p: The SEM analysis allowed visualizing the biofilms layers formed by E. coli O157:H7 ( Figure 5a,c) and S. epidermidis ATCC12228 ( Figure 5e,g) after growing for 24 h and without EO treatment (control). Here, once exposed to thymol-carvacrol-chemotype (II) oil (treatment), a disruption of the cellular and structural integrity of the biofilm was observed ( Figure 5b,d,f,h). These results are in accordance with the inhibition biofilm assays showed previously.
